channel.title: Comments on: Floating Point and currency
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: By: IrioMk
item.dc:creator: IrioMk
item.description:
I published an article calling attention for the same (initial) point with days of difference.
If you find it worthy: http://blog.iriomk.com/post/98382401723/ruby-numeric-types-dos-and-do-nots
item.content:encoded:
I published an article calling attention for the same (initial) point with days of difference.

If you find it worthy: http://blog.iriomk.com/post/98382401723/ruby-numeric-types-dos-and-do-nots

item.title: By: rcillo

item.description:
